name: ANTiVIRuS (Soulo)
description:
The game made for Ludum Dare 45 in 72 hours. It's theme was "start with nothing".

    I had finished the game before the deadline, but I didn't manage to upload it then. I was very sad about it.

    Now, a week later, I do it. I didn't add any new functions, but fixed some bugs and grammatical mistakes.

So, about the game itself.

    You are playing for the antivirus, your task is to keep files on the desktop and fight with viruses.

Controls:

    Use arrows to move and jump, space to hold objects. The character is a mouse cursor, therefore you don't use real mouse. Instead of this, jump on buttons. You are able to move any objects and jump on them.

WARNING! The game contains real viruses that can harm your real computer in case of lose!  (it was a joke (or not :D ))

Authors:

Julia Ryzhova - drawing

Mikhail Popov - moral support

Soulo - everything else
